task_description: Facing the building to your North (approx. 2°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: I need to see the top of the building to estimate its height, so I will look up.

I can now see the top and bottom of the building; it appears to be about 8-9 stories high, and assuming a standard floor height of 3 meters plus a taller ground floor, I estimate the total height to be around 30 meters.
